query:
SELECT 
    ic.id,
    i.name as ingredient_name,
    ic.fromUnit,
    ic.toUnit,
    ic.conversionFactor,
    ic.notes
FROM ingredientConversions ic
JOIN ingredients i ON ic.ingredientId = i.id
WHERE i.name LIKE '%Scallops%'
ORDER BY ic.fromUnit, ic.toUnit;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute

    ic.fromUnit,
    ic.toUnit,
    ic.conversionFactor,
    ic.notes
FROM ingredientConversions ic

WHERE i.name LIKE '%Scallops%'
